project.name: zonaenglish-ambassador-landing
project.description: ZonaEnglish School Ambassador recruitment landing page - single-page React application

libraries.name: framer-motion
libraries.purpose: Animation library for modals, accordions, transitions
libraries.usage: Modal transitions, FAQ accordion animations, slide-in mobile menu

libraries.name: lucide-react
libraries.usage: Import individual icons: import { IconName } from 'lucide-react'

patterns.sections: py-16 max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8

libraries.name: vite
libraries.config: Standard React plugin setup in vite.config.ts

whatsapp.purpose: Form submissions send formatted messages to WhatsApp
whatsapp.flow: User fills form → Format message → Open WhatsApp link → Reset form

eventHandlers.example: const handleInputChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<...>) => { const { name, value } = e.target; ... }

animations.accordion: AnimatePresence + motion.div with height: 0 to auto

styling.brandColors: Use #03345c for navy, #fcd547 for yellow CTAs
styling.cards: rounded-3xl border border-slate-200 bg-white p-6 shadow-sm

developmentWorkflow.lint: npm run lint (ESLint with flat config)
developmentWorkflow.build: npm run build (TypeScript compile + Vite build → dist/)
developmentWorkflow.preview: npm run preview (test production build locally)

steps: Insert <section> in App.tsx between existing sections
Use className='bg-white' or 'bg-sky-50/60' for alternating backgrounds
Wrap content in max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-16
Add anchor link to navbar if needed
Accordion animation handled automatically by FAQItem component
Import from lucide-react: import { IconName } from 'lucide-react'

constraints.architecture: Keep all code in App.tsx unless explicitly asked to refactor
constraints.noTests: No test suite configured - manual testing only
constraints.noEnvVars: All URLs and constants hardcoded in App.tsx
constraints.noCodeSplitting: Single bundle - no lazy loading or route-based splitting
constraints.assets: PNG images in src/assets/ exist but not imported (placeholders used in code)

troubleshooting.buildErrors: Check TypeScript strict mode compliance - no unused vars/params allowed
troubleshooting.stylingIssues: Ensure Tailwind classes are correct, check brand colors #03345c and #fcd547
troubleshooting.animationBugs: Verify Framer Motion AnimatePresence wraps animated elements, check initial/animate/exit props
troubleshooting.formIssues: WhatsApp message formatting - ensure template literals are correct, URL encoding applied
